Subject: Battles at Black Fortress

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::KitKat2/DrillBit::

She turned to DrillBit.
"Something is not right. Beast mode!" She transformed to her wolf mode.
"I can small the scent of Foxfingers' friends, and... gas!"
DrillBit smiled.
"We must be knocking them out." Then the sound of the corrdor closing in
could be heard.
"Interesting," he said, as he opened a comm link. "Shivah, its DrillBit.
What exactly is going on? KitKat can smell the intruders and gas. And we
are hearing... well I dont know what we are hearing."
